text: Eduard Strauss (15 March 1835, Vienna - 28 December 1916, Vienna) was a Viennese composer of light music. He was also a conductor. He was the brother of the more famous composers Johann Strauss II and Josef Strauss, the son of Johann Strauss I, and the father of Johann Strauss III. == Other websites == * Eduard Strauss on the Johann Strauss Society of Great Britain * A complete list of Eduard Strauss' compositions Category:1835 births Category:1916 deaths Category:Austrian composers
title: Eduard Strauss
